title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.1 - Coasting on bridges with sleds, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.1 - Coasting on bridges with sleds, etc

State Regulations

No person shall coast on the bridges with handsleds, bobs, carts or other vehicles on wheels or runners. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
655.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
